casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Charles Wayne SILVERS. No. 621P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Nora Henry Hargrove, for Charles Wayne Silvers. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Elizabeth Lari, Assistant District Attorney, William C. Young, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 4th day of November 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of December 2005."
